item.title: Reimagining Mutual Information for Enhanced Defense against Data Leakage in Collaborative Inference
item.description: InfoScissors defends collaborative inference from data leakage by cleverly reducing the mutual information between model outputs and sensitive device data, thus ensuring robust privacy without comprom…
